name: Mud Runner
description:
Ever had one of those days where you're being chased by a giant ball of mud whilst smaller balls of mud rain from the sky?

Me neither. But now you can!

This is a VERY early version so please don't expect something amazing!

I'm a 17 year old game dev still studying it in college. This was just something I decided to do in my spare time but I decided I would release an early version to get feedback + suggestions from you guys! :)

This version took me 2 days to make so like I said, VERY EARLY!

Known Bugs

  • Walking animations don't play sometimes
  • You can slide forever
  • Sometimes get stuck on the side of blocks

Features I Will Add

  • Star counter
  • Time counter
  • High scores
  • More levels
  • More collectables and obstacles
  • Something to actually happen at the end xD
  • Good suggestions by you guys!

Here is a link to my website if you want to support me further!

(I run garry's mod servers this is my communities forums but I do my development blogs etc here)

Thanks guys and have a great day!
